name: Crystals of Niberium
description: Planet Niberium turned out to be rich in rare precious crystal. Space Corporation Sigma decided to extract these crystals. The extraction was carried out by NKX-627 Robot series. However, soon the Corporation Sigma discovered that they were not the only ones who were interested in the crystals.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio Additional Notes: not work on windows 10
